A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After the abysmal failure of episode 7\, I told myself I would not go and watch 8\, but I did anyway.  Why?  Because it's Star Wars.  But this! This is not Star Wars\, this is an abysmal failure of epic proportions.  How can you call a 2 1/2 hour movie about a space chase Star Wars!?!?  How does Disney keep getting this wrong?  Don't get me wrong\, it was beautifully made\, great graphics\, good directing\, but a very poor story.  \n\nRian Johnson has hammered the final nail in the coffin.  This is not a Star Wars movie\, it didn't feel like Star Wars\, it didn't have the emotions or the powerful moments like the original trilogy.
